description:
"Shows exactly what to do! This course is direct, to the point and quickly changed the way I approach business trips."

  • Learn my essential tactics for eating well on business trips.
  • Recognize the common pitfalls that sidetrack you and how to avoid them.
  • Understand the science behind nutrients, energy and blood sugar.
  • Hear my proven ways to handle travel days and airports with ease.
  • Get my unbiased research on what to eat at all the popular restaurants.
  • Learn the coolest coolers, bottles and bags for business travel.

Check www.healthybiztravel.com for more info.
title: Healthy Eating for Business Travelers
